summary: The "Angels", a San Pedro motorcycle gang, parties in the Coachella Valley's Palm Springs Indian Canyons, California, and wreaks havoc with the local police.
cast: Peter Fonda|Nancy Sinatra|Bruce Dern|Diane Ladd|Buck Taylor|Norman Alden|Michael J. Pollard|Lou Procopio|Joan Shawlee|Marc Cavell|Coby Denton|Frank Maxwell|Gayle Hunnicutt|Gina Grant|Art Baker|Dick Miller|Kim Hamilton|Hal Bokar|Jack Bernardi|Frank Gerstle|Peter Bogdanovich|Barboura Morris
